IDBObjectStoreClear.summary:
The clear() method of the
interface creates and immediately returns an object, and
clears this object store in a separate thread. This is for deleting all the current
data out of an object store.

remarks.para:
Clearing an object store consists of removing all records from the object store and
removing all records in indexes that reference the object store. To remove only some of
the records in a store, use passing a key
or .

IDBObjectStoreClear.returns: An object on which subsequent events related to this operation are fired.If the operation is successful, the value of the request's property is undefined.
